quotes.quote: Die with memories, not dreams.
I'm adicted to my iPhone and get a game for it every few days.
quotes.author: Todd Howard

quotes.quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Don't wait for a special day because each day you have is special.
quotes.author: Dhar Mann

quotes.quote: When you stare into the abyss the abyss stares back at you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Without passion, you are already dead.
quotes.author: Max Payne

quotes.quote: The circumstances of one's birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.
quotes.author: MewTwo

quotes.quote: Work hard, have fun, make history.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Good things take time.
If we shouldn't eat at night, why is there a light in the fridge?
I just say morning, cause if it was a good morning I'd be fishing.
Whatever you do, always give 100%. Unless you're donating blood.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: How can you tell the difference between a chemist and a plumber? Ask them to pronounce the word unionized.
I'm 19 years old and I've already wasted my entire life.
quotes.author: Burgerpants

quotes.quote: Sparing me won't change anything. Killing me is the only way to end this.
quotes.author: Flowey

quotes.quote: If you let me live... I'll come back.
quotes.author: Flowey

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Words aren't the only way to tell someone how you feel.
quotes.author: Tifa Lockheart

quotes.quote: The closer you get to the light, the greater your shadow becomes.
I don't have friends. I got family.
quotes.author: Dominic Toretto

quotes.quote: I want to ask you. Do you think love can bloom even on a battlefield?
quotes.author: Otacon

quotes.quote: To win big, you sometimes have to take big risks.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Just roll the ball :)
quotes.author: bowling.
